summary:
A small mod that adds a new follower called lizard lips, it also adds a boss and new dungeon found across the river in River Wood.
WARNING! This mod is a work in progress and will be updated regularly.
descriptionHtml:
A small mod that adds a new follower called lizard lips, it also adds a boss and new dungeon found across the river in River Wood. To find the dungeon, fast travel to River Wood and go through the gate and turn left and across the river and there you go.
WARNING! This mod is a work in progress and will be updated regularly.
author: Emerald Sky
